tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stakeholders (
    stakeholder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE emails (
    email_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_email VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_email VARCHAR(255),
    subject TEXT,
    body TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE phone_calls (
    call_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_number VARCHAR(15),
    receiver_number VARCHAR(15),
    duration INTERVAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_notes (
    note_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    attendees TEXT[],
    note TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE emails ( 
 email_id INT NOT NULL, 
 sender VARCHAR(255), 
 receiver VARCHAR(255), 
 subject VARCHAR(255), 
 body TEXT, 
 date_sent TIMESTAMP, 
 PRIMARY KEY (email_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE phone_calls ( 
 call_id INT NOT NULL, 
 caller VARCHAR(255), 
 receiver VARCHAR(255), 
 duration INT, 
 call_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
 PRIMARY KEY (call_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE meetings_notes ( 
 note_id INT NOT NULL, 
 meeting_id INT, 
 attendee VARCHAR(255), 
 note TEXT, 
 created_at TIMESTAMP, 
 PRIMARY KEY (note_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE communications_log (
  communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  communication_type VARCHAR(255),
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  sender_name VARCHAR(255),
  receiver_name VARCHAR(255),
  message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE emails (
  email_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_email VARCHAR(255),
  receiver_email VARCHAR(255),
  subject VARCHAR(255),
  body TEXT,
  sent_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE phone_calls (
  call_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_number VARCHAR(20),
  receiver_number VARCHAR(20),
  call_duration INTERVAL,
  call_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_notes (
  note_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id UUID,
  attendee VARCHAR(255),
  note TEXT,
  meeting_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE stakeholders (
  stakeholder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  stakeholder_name VARCHAR(255),
  organization VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(255),
  contact_info TEXT
);
